attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask for the following reform to the House of Commons & House of Lords:
- Fixed-term Parliaments to give certainty to the electorate as to a General Election and to end of the advantages given to a sitting Government.
- A written constitution outlining and guaranteeing the rights of voters and the limits of government.
- Lessening the control of Whips and allowing freedom of conscience for MPs.
- Fixed terms for MPs to allow a renewal of each post and avoiding the complacency of a 'job-for-life'.
- Greater independence for Select Committees and the power for parliament to elect rather than appoint Chair persons.
